mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMENT ( COMENT_IDX, COMENT_CONT, BOARD_IDX, USERCODE, COM_BNUM, COM_NREF ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(COMENT_IDX),0) +1 FROM COMENT), #{ coment_cont }, #{ board_idx }, #{ usercode }, (SELECT NVL(MAX(COMENT_IDX),0) +1 FROM COMENT), (SELECT NVL(MAX(COMENT_IDX),0) +1 FROM COMENT) )
mapper.select: SELECT C.COMENT_IDX, C.COMENT_CONT, C.COMENT_REGDATE, C.BOARD_IDX, C.USERCODE, C.DELCOMENT, C.COM_BNUM, C.COM_LVL, C.COM_STEP, C.COM_NREF, C.COM_PARENT, M.NICKNAME FROM COMENT C JOIN MEMBER M ON C.USERCODE = M.USERCODE WHERE C.BOARD_IDX = #{ board_idx } ORDER BY C.COM_NREF DESC, C.COM_STEP ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COMENT WHERE COMENT_IDX = #{ coment_idx }
UPDATE COMENT SET DELCOMENT = 1 WHERE COMENT_IDX = #{ coment_idx }
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT COM_PARENT FROM COMENT WHERE COM_PARENT = #{ coment_idx } ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM DUAL
